post:
50% recurring discount on ISP [blacklist monitoring](https://www.debouncer.com) plans up to 16,384 IP addresses. Coupon code: LET50.
* 24 hours monitoring interval
* IPv4 addresses only, domains not supported
* 600 IP addresses  - <del>$11.95</del> $5.97 per month
* 2048 IP addresses  - <del>$19.95</del> $9.97 per month
* 4096 IP addresses - <del>$29.95</del> $14.97 per month
* 8192 IP addresses  - <del>$49.95</del> $24.97 per month
* 16384 IP addresses  - <del>$89.95</del> $44.97 per month

30% recurring discount on Basic [blacklist monitoring](https://www.debouncer.com) plans up to 200 blacklist monitors. Coupon code: LET30.
* 8 hours monitoring interval
* IPv4 addresses, domains
* 10 blacklist monitors  - <del>$35</del> $24.50 per year
* 30 blacklist monitors  - <del>$6.95</del> $4.86 per month
* 100 blacklist monitors - <del>$14.95</del> $10.46 per month
* 200 blacklist monitors - <del>$24.95</del> $12.47 per month

30% recurring discount on Professional [blacklist monitoring](https://www.debouncer.com) plans up to 50 blacklist monitors. Coupon code: LET30.
* 4 hours monitoring interval
* IPv4 addresses, domains
* 30 blacklist monitors  - <del>13.95</del> $9.76 per month
* 50 blacklist monitors  - <del>$19.95</del> $13.96 per month

All plans include:
* [Email](https://www.debouncer.com/images/notification.png), [URL callback](https://www.debouncer.com/callback), Telegram notifications, daily or weekly customizable PDF or HTML email reports. [PDF report example](https://www.debouncer.com/report.pdf)  
* IP address description auto update with it's rDNS
* Blacklist severity customization
* [Flagged blacklist monitors](https://www.debouncer.com/flags)
* [Blacklist monitor group summary reports](https://www.debouncer.com/images/blsummary.png)
* [Outlook.com SNDS](https://sendersupport.olc.protection.outlook.com/snds/index.aspx) blacklist, complaint rate and trap hits monitoring (requires [SNDS automated access key](https://sendersupport.olc.protection.outlook.com/snds/auto.aspx))
* 1 year blacklist status history
* API

To secure the discount register free trial account at [https://www.debouncer.com](https://www.debouncer.com) and enter coupon code at checkout.

Offer valid through November 29th.
@Jord, thank you for provider tag.
